headline: A Look At Verizon (VZ) Valuation As Shares Drift Lower Despite Solid Earnings
summary: With no fresh company specific headlines driving attention today, Verizon Communications (VZ) remains in focus for investors assessing a large US telecom provider that reported US$137.5b in revenue and US$19.8b in net income. See our latest analysis for Verizon Communications. The share price at US$40.52 has seen a 2.8% decline over the past 30 days and a 2.1% decline over 90 days, while the 1 year total shareholder return of 9.3% points to steadier long term momentum. If Verizon’s recent...

headline: *MEDIA ALERT* Verizon Launches The Ultimate Super Bowl LX Experience

headline: *MEDIA ALERT* Verizon and David Beckham Kick Off Third Wave of Verizon Ultimate Access, Dropping Free FIFA World Cup 2026™ Tickets Exclusively for Customers
summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 05, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WHAT: Verizon is back with David Beckham to announce the third Verizon Ultimate Access ticket drop for FIFA World Cup 2026™ giving customers an unprecedented opportunity to attend World Cup matches. From January 7-11, customers will have the chance to score hundreds of free tickets to every match, including all group stage matches in every U.S. city.
